title: 6.22 Is not Updating?
body:
So Yesterday i started updating my league to 6.22 like anyone would do but accidentally i kicked my computer and it got shut down, I reopened my PC and tried to re-Update it but it kept saying "Unspecified Error occurred, Please check the Log for more information" and i didn't know what to do, so i tried to restart my computer, then tried to uninstall league and reinstall it but nothing worked.
PS:- Sometimes it says something about the Champions being corrupt or something at the bottom of my task bar on my computer!!!


PLEASE HELP!!! I want to be able to play ,but i cant ;C

replies.body: It seems to be a network error if it's "Unspecified Error occurred", I'm pretty sure it's not to do with the actual client then.

I downloaded the new .Net framework 4.6.2 , moved league of legends from Program files to C:/
I lost the message and it started downloading the 2gb patch.
Then "Unspecified Error occurred" popped up again, i then clicked the question mark and did repair and let it play threw and its now working.
Good luck
